attributes.action: Add Martial Arts ( karate) to the GCSE Pe
attributes.additional_details: I think that activities like martial arts are much more  popular than ever at the minute children partake in them from all backgrounds. I couldn’t believe the limitations of what students are allowed to chose. Why is it that a student can partake at competition level for certain sports, such as karate but can't do the activity for GCSE? I feel it's unfair and some of the activities on the list are unreal, I feel myself karate (Martial Arts)is straight forward to assess for GCSE sports

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Add boxing and martial arts to the education curriculum
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715681
